title: Lay And Be Lonely
lyrics:
Lay and be lonely
Lay and be lonely
Lay and be lone- mmh
Lay and be lonely
Lay and be lonely
Lay and be lonely



Am I a fighter

Or am I just patient?

I know I'm a fool either way

But if there is something

I could be known for

It would be tranquility through time



When I am quiet

There is a motion

Shadows do rise

And I am no songbird

At least not on most days

Most days I sing alone



Lay and be lonely

Lay and be lonely

Lay and be lonely

Lay and be lonely

Lay and be lonely

Lay and be lone-
